value.name: Valparaiso man killed in South Haven standoff with police
value.description: The Porter County Coroner’s Office and Indiana State Police, called in by the sheriff’s department to investigate the shooting, identified the man as Alexander Tuzinski, 30, of Valparaiso.

value.name: Valparaiso man killed amid standoff with police in Porter Co.
value.description: Police say deputies responded to a disturbance and after several hours entered a home. They say Alexander Tuzinski was holding a gun. At some point, he was shot and died of his injuries. The deputy's names have not been released.
